languages.text: "Я даже не пыталась! Зачем мне знать что-либо про мерзость врагов человечества, когда все чего я хочу — сжечь здесь все в чистом, яростном пламени? Все, что мне нужно, я уже знаю — это место есть зло, но и в нем встречаются слуги Императора, достойные спасения".

traits.locale_text: "Я даже не пыталась! Зачем мне знать что-либо про мерзость врагов человечества, когда все чего я хочу — сжечь здесь все в чистом, яростном пламени? Все, что мне нужно, я уже знаю — это место есть зло, но и в нем встречаются слуги Императора, достойные спасения".

languages.text: "I have made no attempt to do so! What need do I have to know of the depravity of the enemies of Humanity, when all I want is to burn it all in pure, raging flame? I already know all I need to — this place is evil, but there are servants of the Emperor here worthy of salvation."
languages.original_text: "Я даже не пыталась! Зачем мне знать что-либо про мерзость врагов человечества, когда все чего я хочу — сжечь здесь все в чистом, яростном пламени? Все, что мне нужно, я уже знаю — это место есть зло, но и в нем встречаются слуги Императора, достойные спасения".

traits.locale_text: "I have made no attempt to do so! What need do I have to know of the depravity of the enemies of Humanity, when all I want is to burn it all in pure, raging flame? I already know all I need to — this place is evil, but there are servants of the Emperor here worthy of salvation."

"I have made no attempt to do so! What need do I have to know of the depravity of the enemies of Humanity, when all I want is to burn it all in pure, raging flame? I already know all I need to — this place is evil, but there are servants of the Emperor here worthy of salvation."

"I have made no attempt to do so! What need do I have to know of the depravity of the enemies of Humanity, when all I want is to burn it all in pure, raging flame? I already know all I need to — this place is evil, but there are servants of the Emperor here worthy of salvation."

"I have made no attempt to do so! What need do I have to know of the depravity of the enemies of Humanity, when all I want is to burn it all in pure, raging flame? I already know all I need to — this place is evil, but there are servants of the Emperor here worthy of salvation."

languages.text: “我根本没打算过要这么做！我有什么必要了解人类之敌的堕落之举？我只想用汹涌而纯净的烈焰将它付之一炬。这个地方充满了邪恶，但帝皇沦落此地的仆人需要拯救。这就是我需要知道的一切，我已经知道了。”
languages.original_text: "I have made no attempt to do so! What need do I have to know of the depravity of the enemies of Humanity, when all I want is to burn it all in pure, raging flame? I already know all I need to — this place is evil, but there are servants of the Emperor here worthy of salvation."

traits.locale_text: “我根本没打算过要这么做！我有什么必要了解人类之敌的堕落之举？我只想用汹涌而纯净的烈焰将它付之一炬。这个地方充满了邪恶，但帝皇沦落此地的仆人需要拯救。这就是我需要知道的一切，我已经知道了。”

languages.text: «¡Ni siquiera lo he intentado! ¿Para qué necesito saber nada sobre la depravación de los enemigos de la Humanidad cuando todo lo que quiero es purificar la zona con la furia de las llamas? Sé cuanto necesito saber: estamos en un lugar malvado donde hay sirvientes del Emperador dignos de ser salvados».
languages.original_text: "I have made no attempt to do so! What need do I have to know of the depravity of the enemies of Humanity, when all I want is to burn it all in pure, raging flame? I already know all I need to — this place is evil, but there are servants of the Emperor here worthy of salvation."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ni siquiera lo he intentado! ¿Para qué necesito saber nada sobre la depravación de los enemigos de la Humanidad cuando todo lo que quiero es purificar la zona con la furia de las llamas? Sé cuanto necesito saber: estamos en un lugar malvado donde hay sirvientes del Emperador dignos de ser salvados».

languages.text: 「そんなことをするものか！人類の敵の腐敗を知る必要など、あるものか。私が為すべきは、それを怒りの炎にて浄化することだというのに。私は知るべきことをすでに知っている…こは邪悪な地であるが、救いに値する皇帝のしもべがいるのだということを」
languages.original_text: "I have made no attempt to do so! What need do I have to know of the depravity of the enemies of Humanity, when all I want is to burn it all in pure, raging flame? I already know all I need to — this place is evil, but there are servants of the Emperor here worthy of salvation."

traits.locale_text: 「そんなことをするものか！人類の敵の腐敗を知る必要など、あるものか。私が為すべきは、それを怒りの炎にて浄化することだというのに。私は知るべきことをすでに知っている…こは邪悪な地であるが、救いに値する皇帝のしもべがいるのだということを」

languages.text: "Ich habe es nicht versucht! Was muss ich von der Verkommenheit der Feinde der Menschheit wissen, wenn ich sie doch nur mit purer, zorniger Flamme einäschern will? Ich weiß bereits alles, was ich wissen muss — dies ist ein Ort des Bösen, doch es gibt hier Diener des Imperators, die würdig sind, gerettet zu werden."
languages.original_text: "I have made no attempt to do so! What need do I have to know of the depravity of the enemies of Humanity, when all I want is to burn it all in pure, raging flame? I already know all I need to — this place is evil, but there are servants of the Emperor here worthy of salvation."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe es nicht versucht! Was muss ich von der Verkommenheit der Feinde der Menschheit wissen, wenn ich sie doch nur mit purer, zorniger Flamme einäschern will? Ich weiß bereits alles, was ich wissen muss — dies ist ein Ort des Bösen, doch es gibt hier Diener des Imperators, die würdig sind, gerettet zu werden."

languages.text: « Je n'ai rien tenté de la sorte ! Quel besoin aurais-je de connaître l'étendue de la perversion des ennemis de l'humanité, alors que je ne demande qu'à l'éradiquer d'une flamme vengeresse ? Je sais déjà tout ce que j'ai besoin de savoir : ce lieu est maléfique, mais il abrite aussi des serviteurs de l'Empereur dignes d'être secourus. »
languages.original_text: "I have made no attempt to do so! What need do I have to know of the depravity of the enemies of Humanity, when all I want is to burn it all in pure, raging flame? I already know all I need to — this place is evil, but there are servants of the Emperor here worthy of salvation."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai rien tenté de la sorte ! Quel besoin aurais-je de connaître l'étendue de la perversion des ennemis de l'humanité, alors que je ne demande qu'à l'éradiquer d'une flamme vengeresse ? Je sais déjà tout ce que j'ai besoin de savoir : ce lieu est maléfique, mais il abrite aussi des serviteurs de l'Empereur dignes d'être secourus. »

languages.original_text: "I have made no attempt to do so! What need do I have to know of the depravity of the enemies of Humanity, when all I want is to burn it all in pure, raging flame? I already know all I need to — this place is evil, but there are servants of the Emperor here worthy of salvation."

languages.text: "Aklımın ucundan bile geçmedi! İnsanlık düşmanlarının günahlarından bana ne? Benim tek arzum, hepsini saf ve çağlayan alevlerde yakıp kül etmek! Her şey zaten ortada. Habis bir yer olsa da burada kurtuluşu hak eden İmparatorluk hizmetkârları var."
languages.original_text: "I have made no attempt to do so! What need do I have to know of the depravity of the enemies of Humanity, when all I want is to burn it all in pure, raging flame? I already know all I need to — this place is evil, but there are servants of the Emperor here worthy of salvation."

traits.locale_text: "Aklımın ucundan bile geçmedi! İnsanlık düşmanlarının günahlarından bana ne? Benim tek arzum, hepsini saf ve çağlayan alevlerde yakıp kül etmek! Her şey zaten ortada. Habis bir yer olsa da burada kurtuluşu hak eden İmparatorluk hizmetkârları var."
